txt.en: Wanted: Sleek fur from the beasts in the area of the Bruinen Source.  \n\nThe dwarves of the Misty Mountains have requested a collection of sleek fur.
This collection box is checked daily by the dwarves. Your collection is sure to reach the requesting party.
'There are beasts all throughout the Bruinen Source, and we can find uses for their skin, their fur, and their ears. If you bring any of these to me here, I will see that they are put to good use.'
The dwarves of the Misty Mountains have requested a collection of sleek fur.
Deliver the sleek fur to Larus Sharpshard at Gl√≥in's Camp in the Misty Mountains
Collection boxes for this task can be found at the camps within the Misty Mountains.\n\nYou should bring the trophies you gathered to a collection box.
Wanted: Sleek fur from the beasts in the area of the Bruinen Source.
Collect sleek fur and drop them in a collection box ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
